        Get the currently selected color.
        Returns:
        The ARGB value of the currently selected color.

      • setColorPicker

        public void setColorPicker(ColorPicker picker)
        Adds a ColorPicker instance to the bar.

        WARNING: Don't change the color picker. it is done already when the bar is added to the ColorPicker
        Parameters:
        picker -
        See Also:
        ColorPicker.addSVBar(SVBar)
